title: The free schoole of vvarre, or, A treatise, vvhether it be lawfull to beare armes for the seruice of a prince that is of a diuers religion
author: Sarpi, Paolo, 1552-1623.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Bill, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,
notes: A translation by Sir Nathaniel Brent of an untraced work by Paolo Sarpi; the Latin translation was entitled: Quaestio quodlibetica.
Editor's note "To the reader" signed: W.B., i.e. William Bedell.
Some running titles read: The true schoole of warre.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
